0xd798d527F770ad920BB50680dBC202bB0a1DaF.name: QuickCheck #1
0xd798d527F770ad920BB50680dBC202bB0a1DaF.description: QuickCheck uses machine learning to provide loans instantly to customers in Nigeria. Through its mobile app, customers can apply for a loan, and have them funded in minutes.

0x2107ade0e536b8b0b85cca5e0c0c3f66e58c05.name: QuickCheck #2
0x2107ade0e536b8b0b85cca5e0c0c3f66e58c05.description: QuickCheck uses machine learning to provide loans instantly to customers in Nigeria. Through its mobile app, customers can apply for a loan, and have them funded in minutes.

0x1cc90f7bb292dab6fa4398f3763681cfe497db.name: QuickCheck #3
0x1cc90f7bb292dab6fa4398f3763681cfe497db.description: QuickCheck uses machine learning to provide loans instantly to customers in Nigeria. Through its mobile app, customers can apply for a loan, and have them funded in minutes.

0x3634855ec1beaf6f9be0f7d2f67fc9cb5f4eee.name: Aspire #1
0x3634855ec1beaf6f9be0f7d2f67fc9cb5f4eee.description: Aspire is a modern bank for businesses in Southeast Asia. The company provides businesses with seamless payments, savings products, tools to help teams manage their finances, and a range of credit products to help businesses grow.

0x9e8B9182ABbA7b4C188C979bC8F4C79F7f4c90.name: Aspire #2
0x9e8B9182ABbA7b4C188C979bC8F4C79F7f4c90.description: Aspire is a modern bank for businesses in Southeast Asia. The company provides businesses with seamless payments, savings products, tools to help teams manage their finances, and a range of credit products to help businesses grow.

0x8bbd80F88e662e56B918c353DA635E210ECe93.name: Aspire #3
0x8bbd80F88e662e56B918c353DA635E210ECe93.description: Aspire is a modern bank for businesses in Southeast Asia. The company provides businesses with seamless payments, savings products, tools to help teams manage their finances, and a range of credit products to help businesses grow.

0x1e73b5c1a3570b362d46ae9bf429b25c05e514.name: PayJoy
0x1e73b5c1a3570b362d46ae9bf429b25c05e514.description: PayJoy offers a buy-now-pay-later product that allows consumers to transform the purchases of mobile phones into monthly installment plans. They serve customers in Mexico and other emerging markets.

0x67df471eacd82c3dbc95604618ff2a1f6b14b8.name: Almavest Basket #1
0x67df471eacd82c3dbc95604618ff2a1f6b14b8.description: Almavest provides debt capital to high-performing companies in a variety of sectors globally. This loan was used to provide debt capital to Selfin - an SME lender in India, Upwards - an consumer lender in India, Impact Water - a company that provides safe drinking water systems in Africa, and Greenway - an Indian company that makes ‘clean cookstoves’ for low-income households globally.

0xe32c22e4D95caE1fB805C60C9e0026ed57971B.name: Almavest Basket #2
0xe32c22e4D95caE1fB805C60C9e0026ed57971B.description: Almavest provides debt capital to high-performing companies in a variety of sectors globally. This loan was used to provide debt capital to Adelantos - an asset financier providing loans secured on mobile phones across LatAm.

0xefeb69edf6b6999b0e3f2fa856a2acf3bdea4a.name: Almavest Basket #3
0xefeb69edf6b6999b0e3f2fa856a2acf3bdea4a.description: Almavest provides debt capital to high-performing companies in a variety of sectors globally. This facility will be utilized by Almavest to invest in a) inclusive lenders (which pledge pools of underlying microfinance, small business, or other loans as collateral); and b) carbon reduction project developers (which pledge carbon offsets or receivables from their sale as collateral).

0xC13465CE9Ae3Aa184eB536F04FDc3f54D2dEf2.name: Oya, via Almavest
0xC13465CE9Ae3Aa184eB536F04FDc3f54D2dEf2.description: Almavest provides debt capital to high-performing companies in a variety of sectors globally. This loan was used to provide debt capital to Oya - an asset financier providing loans helping small and medium sized business across Africa scale up.
